 */export var TOGGLE_OVERLAY='TOGGLE_OVERLAY';export var HIDE_ACTIVE_OVERLAY='HIDE_ACTIVE_OVERLAY';export var HIDE_ACTIVE_POPUP='HIDE_ACTIVE_POPUP';/** @namespace Store/Overlay/Action/toggleOverlayByKey */export var toggleOverlayByKey=middleware(function(overlayKey){return{type:TOGGLE_OVERLAY,overlayKey:overlayKey};},"Store/Overlay/Action/toggleOverlayByKey");/** @namespace Store/Overlay/Action/hideActiveOverlay */export var hideActiveOverlay=middleware(function(){return{type:HIDE_ACTIVE_OVERLAY};},"Store/Overlay/Action/hideActiveOverlay");/** @namespace Store/Overlay/Action/hideActivePopup */export var hideActivePopup=middleware(function(){var shouldPopupClose=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:true;return{type:HIDE_ACTIVE_POPUP,payload:shouldPopupClose};},"Store/Overlay/Action/hideActivePopup");
